refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: unicapgtk_get_user_config_path ()
refsect2.para: Get path to the directory containing the configuration files

refsect2.title: unicapgtk_save_device_state ()
refsect2.para: Saves the current device state. If UNICAPGTK_DEVICE_STATE_VIDEO_FORMAT is set in the flags field, a section containing information about the current video format is added to the configuration file. If UNICAPGTK_DEVICE_STATE_PROPERTIES is set, a section containing the current state of the device properties is added to the configuration file.

listitem.simpara: A newly allocated GKeyfile. Must be freed with g_key_file_free() by the application.

refsect2.title: unicapgtk_load_device_state ()

listitem.simpara: GKeyFile to load the device state information from
UnicapgtkDeviceStateFlags specifying what parts to configure Reads device state information from a key-file and sets the parameters of a device accordingly.

refsect2.title: unicapgtk_check_version ()
refsect2.para: Checks whether the installed library version is newer or equal to the given version

listitem.simpara: STATUS_INCOMPATIBLE_MAJOR_VERSION if the given major version is too old STATUS_INCOMPATIBLE_MINOR_VERSION if the given minor version is too old STATUS_INCOMPATIBLE_MACRO_VERSION if the given macro version is too old STATUS_SUCCESS if the version is compatible
